entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Hopedale
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hopedale 5:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with snow. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
